H0.text: Insulation is the cause of the heat energy produced by rubbing cold hands together to warm them.

H1.text: Magnetism is the cause of the heat energy produced when you warm cold hands by rubbing them together.

H2.text: Friction is the heat energy produced when you warm cold hands by rubbing them together.

H3.text: Conduction is the process that causes the heat energy produced when you warm cold hands by rubbing them together.
